001package org.relationlearn.filters;
002
003import weka.core.Attribute;
004
005/**
006 * The TextFilter interface represents an object capable of obtaining a 
007 * certain information from a pair of text Strings and map them to a 
008 * given Attribute to be used when creating Instance objects.
009 * 
010 * @see weka.core.Attribute
011 * @see weka.core.Instance
012 * @see FilterGroup
013 */
014public interface TextFilter {
015    
016    /**
017     * Returns the Attribute that this filter provides a value for.
018     * 
019     * @return the Attribute this filter gives a value to
020     */
021    public Attribute getMappedAttribute();
022    
023    /**
024     * Filters the corresponding pair of String values and returns its
025     * value in the weka internal floating-point format.
026     * <p/>
027     * The method return type is able to support all types of 
028     * Attribute that exist, with a single method
029     * for all possible TextFilter implementations.
030     * 
031     * @param r Response text in the argumentation
032     * @param h Hypothesis text in the argumentation
033     * 
034     * @return the value of this filter Attribute in weka internal 
035     * floating-point format
036     * 
037     * @see weka.core.Instance#setValue(Attribute,double)
038     */
039    public double filter(String r, String h);
040
041}
